channel.title: Hair metal
channel.description:
Back in the 70's-80's.
I've been hooked on the hair metal for like 3 years now.
Some bands I like:
Great White Poison Winger Ratt Cinderella Ugly kid Joe Vixen
Anyone else like this kind of music?
